data.title: WILLIAM PETTY, NICHOLAS BARBON, MULTIPLES, AND A NEW HYPOTHESIS OF INEVITABLE DISCOVERY
data.meta_description: WILLIAM PETTY, NICHOLAS BARBON, MULTIPLES, AND A NEW HYPOTHESIS OF INEVITABLE DISCOVERY - Volume 31 Issue 3
